segments.text: Are you here about your ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your Honor , the police officer pulled me over for speeding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , Your Honor , I was not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me how many miles per hour you were going .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was going 35 in a 40 mph zone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine , so I'll let you go with a warning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , I don't have to pay the ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You won't have to pay the fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much , Your Honor .
segments.speaker: S2
